primary.context: Caller wants to no longer have ownership over their timeshare
primary.detail: Caller requested a human for ownership exit; transfer failed due to queue unavailability after a 25-minute wait.

steps: AI collected name and intent (ownership exit).
Caller waited in queue for approximately 25 minutes.
AI re-engaged after queue timeout, stating no agents were available.
AI offered general contract info, which caller declined.
Caller asked for a callback, which AI could not provide.

impediment.detail: Caller waited over 25 minutes in the transfer queue only to be told no representatives were available.

actions.detail: Transfer to concierge timed out after 25 minutes.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to discuss ending their timeshare ownership and requested a human agent immediately. After a 25-minute wait in the transfer queue, the AI re-engaged to report no agents were available, leading to an unresolved abandonment.
insights.verbatim: I'm calling about our timeshare. We want to no longer have ownership over it.
